summary: Jupiter is the biggest planet in our solar system and the fifth one from the sun. It's a giant ball of gas, mostly hydrogen and helium. Jupiter is so large that all the other planets could fit inside it. It has a great big storm called the Great Red Spot and a faint ring system. Jupiter has 95 known moons, including four big ones named after Roman gods. It's also the third brightest object in the night sky. Scientists have sent many spacecraft to study Jupiter up close.
title: Jupiter
